houses

Class ImageGallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • presenter.Window
        • houses.ImageGallery

  • public class ImageGallery
extends Window
    This class groups together the image gallery with rectangles to cover thumbnails that are out of bounds, and set the background of the thumbnails.
    Version:
    1.4 (15.03.15)
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImageGallery.GalleryPictures
      This class defines the functionality of the image gallery.
      static class  ImageGallery.Thumbnail
      This class creates a small image of specific size, given by the thumbnailHeight and thumbnailHeight constants.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageGallery

        public ImageGallery(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.Image> galleryList,
            float xPosition,
            float yPosition)
        Constructor instantiates the image gallery and relocates it to a position on the screen.
        Parameters:
        galleryList - an array list of images for the image gallery
        xPosition - the horizontal position of the top-left pixel of the image as it is displayed on the screen
        yPosition - the vertical position of the top-left pixel of the image as it is displayed on the screen

    • Method Detail
